page.title: 17CAPENHURST-SHOPPING HABITS
page.content: In a survey of residents shopping habits it was found that Saturday, Friday & Thursday were the main days used for shopping and in that order of popularity.People are paid on Thursday & Friday & few people work on Saturday Due to the lack of a bus service most shoppers use their cars & to save time & petrol rarely go more than 6 miles. Most people shop for food at Little Sutton because it is near & has a few supermarkets although many travel to Chester for meat.Vegetables & bread are bought at Little Sutton & Hope Farm.Chester,with its variety of shops & large stores,is easily most popular for household goods,furniture,clothes & shoes.These last two items are among the few which people are prepared to travel to Birkenhead & Liverpool,by train,to buy.Chester(35%)Little Sutton (25%)Ellesmere Port(25%)are used most.
